gobblin.configuration

Class SourceState

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.configuration.State
      • gobblin.configuration.SourceState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WritableShim

    public class SourceState
extends State
    A container for all meta data related to a particular source. This includes all properties defined in job configuration files and all properties from tasks of the previous run.

    Properties can be overwritten at runtime and persisted upon job completion. Persisted properties will be loaded in the next run and made available to use by the Source.

    • Method Detail

      • getPreviousSourceState

        public SourceState getPreviousSourceState()
        Get the SourceState of the previous job run.

        This is a convenient method for existing jobs that do not use the new feature that allows output data to be committed on a per-dataset basis. Use of this method assumes that the job deals with a single dataset, which uses the default data URN defined by ConfigurationKeys.DEFAULT_DATASET_URN.

        Returns:
        SourceState of the previous job run or null if no previous SourceState is found

      • getPreviousDatasetState

        public SourceState getPreviousDatasetState(String datasetUrn)
        Get the state (in the form of a SourceState) of a dataset identified by a dataset URN of the previous job run.
        Parameters:
        datasetUrn - the dataset URN
        Returns:
        the dataset state (in the form of a SourceState) of the previous job run or null if no previous dataset state is found for the given dataset URN

      • getPreviousWorkUnitStatesByDatasetUrns

        public Map<String,Iterable<WorkUnitState>> getPreviousWorkUnitStatesByDatasetUrns()
        Get a Map from dataset URNs (as being specified by ConfigurationKeys.DATASET_URN_KEY to the WorkUnitState with the dataset URNs.

        WorkUnitStates that do not have ConfigurationKeys.DATASET_URN_KEY set will be added to the dataset state belonging to ConfigurationKeys.DEFAULT_DATASET_URN.

        Returns:
        a Map from dataset URNs to the WorkUnitState with the dataset URNs

        @Deprecated
public Extract createExtract(Extract.TableType type,

        Deprecated. 
        Create a new properly populated Extract instance.

        This method should always return a new unique Extract instance.

        Returns:
